name: Fix "r/apple" Font Spacing in Firefox on macOS
description: Apply an alternate font-family setting to fix spacing issues present in Firefox on macOS.
additional_info:
• Remove "Apple Color Emoji", primarily responsible for the spacing issues.
  • Use "-apple-system" and "SF Pro Text" to reference the system font.
  • Fall back to "Helvetica Neue" and "-sans-serif".
Original rule in "r/apple" source: 
font-family: ".SFNSText-Regular", ".SFUIText-Regular", ".HelveticaNeueDeskInterface-Regular", "HelveticaNeue", "Segoe UI", "Roboto", "Arial", "Apple Color Emoji", sans-serif<,pre>
This style: 
font-family: -apple-system, "SF Pro Text", "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif;
